text: Antonio Vacca (8 August 1934 - 22 December 2020) was an Italian Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest in 1957. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Alghero-Bosa, Italy, from 1994 to 2006.Diocese of Alghero-Bosa Vacca died of throat cancer on 22 December 2020 at the age of 86.https://www.alguer.it/notizie/n.php?id=156156 LÂ´ex vescovo Vacca torna alla Casa del Padre] ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from throat cancer Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Antonio Vacca
